    Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class ProjectionAPI

    Provides methods for updating the positions of vertices and nodes along spline branches by raycasting onto surfaces below, retrieving and setting projection properties such as raycast length, offset, debug ray visibility, and preservation of normals.

    Inheritance
    object
    ProjectionAPI
    Namespace: ElseForty.splineplus.api
    Assembly: cs.temp.dll.dll
    Syntax
    public class ProjectionAPI
